casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Curtis Louis SANGSTER. No. 84P15-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 25, 2015.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 23rd of November 2015 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of November 2015."
